properties.name: gnap.as.jwks.keystore-location
properties.description: The file path location of the Java KeyStore (JKS) containing the JSON Web Key Set (JWKS) used for signing tokens.

properties.name: gnap.as.jwks.keystore-password
properties.description: The password used to access the Java KeyStore (JKS) file containing the JWKS keys.

properties.name: gnap.as.jwks.key-alias
properties.description: The alias (name) of the specific key within the KeyStore that should be used for signing GNAP tokens.

properties.name: gnap.as.jwks.key-password
properties.description: The password used to access the specific key identified by key-alias within the KeyStore for signing operations.
